pages.text: Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa tada keiji ni yotte, anata gata ni keikoku suru dakedearu.'Daga kikanai mono wa, keikoku sa rete mo sono yobikake ga kikoenai
Soshite anata no omo no chobatsu no ibuki ga, mo shikare-ra ni (sukoshidemo) furereba,`a , nasakenai. Watashi-tachi wa hontoni fugi o okonaimashita.' To iu

Ware wa shinpan no hi no tame ni, koseina hakari o mokeru. 1-Ri to shite tatoe keshi hitotsubu no omo-sadeatte mo futo ni atsukawa reru koto wanai. Ware wa sore o (keisan ni) mochidasu. Ware wa seisan-sha to shite banzendearu
Katsute ware wa, musa to harun ni, shikibetsu to komyo to, osoreru mono e no kunkai o sazuketa
Me ni mienakute mo omo o osoreru mono to, shinpan no toki o osoreru mono e no kunkai o sazuketa
Kono (kuruan) koso wa, ware ga kudashita shukufuku yutakana kunkaidearu. Anata gata wa, soredemo nao kyohi suru no ka
Ware wa izen iburahimu ni, hoseina okonai o sazuketa. Ware wa kare o yoku shitte iru
Kare ga chichi to kare no hitobito ni, ko itta toki o omoi nasai. `Anata gataga suhai suru korera no guzo wa, nani monodearu no ka
Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, sosen ga sorera o suhai suru no o mimashita
Kare wa itta. `Anata gata to anata gata no sosen wa, akiraka ni ayamatte ita nodearu
Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata wa shinri o motarashita nodesu ka. Soretomo tawamureru-shana nodesu ka
Kare wa itta. `Sode wanai. Anata gata no omo wa, ten to ji no omo. (Mu kara) sorera (tenchi) o sozo sa reta katadearu. Soshite watashi wa sore ni taisuru shonin no hitoridearu
Arra ni chikatte, watashi wa anata gataga se o mukete satta nochi ni, anata gata no guzo ni hitotsu no saku o megurasou
